summary.span: Provides access to the properties needed to define a Message Queuing message.

span.span: Provides access to the properties needed to define a Message Queuing message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別查看，或從佇列接收訊息或傳送訊息至佇列時，讓訊息屬性的良好控制。Use the class to peek or receive messages from a queue, or to have fine control over message properties when sending a message to a queue. 會使用類別窺視或接收來自佇列訊息時，因為同時並方法建立的新執行個體類別，並設定執行個體的屬性。 uses the class when it peeks or receives messages from queues, because both the and methods create a new instance of the class and set the instance's properties. 類別的唯讀屬性會套用至從佇列擷取訊息，而讀取/寫入屬性套用至傳送和擷取訊息。The class's read-only properties apply to retrieving messages from a queue, while the read/write properties apply to sending and retrieving messages. 當窺視或接收來自佇列的訊息其屬性會決定哪些訊息的屬性擷取。When peeks or receives a message from a queue, its property determines which of the message's properties are retrieved. 類別的方法可讓您指定任何物件的類型傳送至該佇列的訊息。The class's method allows you to specify any object type for a message being sent to that queue. 您可以使用執行個體的屬性可指定泛型訊息傳送至佇列的設定。You can use the instance's property to specify settings for generic messages sent to the queue. 類型的設定包含格式器、 標籤、 加密及驗證。The types of settings include formatter, label, encryption, and authentication. 您也可以指定適當的值成員時協調回應通知和報表的訊息應用程式訊息。You can also specify values for the appropriate members when you coordinate your messaging application to respond to acknowledgment and report messages. 使用將訊息傳送至佇列的執行個體可讓您彈性地存取和修改其中許多屬性 — 單一訊息或訊息的訊息為基礎。Using a instance to send a message to the queue gives you the flexibility to access and modify many of these properties—either for a single message or on a message-by-message basis. 屬性會優先於。 properties take precedence over . 訊息資料儲存在屬性以及較小的範圍和屬性。Message data is stored in the property and to a lesser extent, the and properties. 加密、 序列化或還原序列化的內容訊息資料時屬性會受到影響。When message data is encrypted, serialized, or deserialized, only the contents of the property are affected. 內容屬性會序列化在傳送訊息時，使用您指定的屬性。The contents of the property are serialized when the message is sent, using the property you specify. 序列化的內容位於屬性。The serialized contents are found in the property. 您也可以設定屬性直接，例如，若要傳送檔案，做為資料內容的訊息。You can also set the property directly, for example, to send a file as the data content of a message. 您可以變更或是當您呼叫隨時傳送訊息，並將資料之前的屬性也會適當地序列化。You can change the or properties at any time before sending the message, and the data will be serialized appropriately when you call . 所定義的屬性屬性只適用於不是類型的訊息。The properties defined by the property apply only to messages that are not of type . 如果您指定屬性，則相同的已命名屬性中的傳送至該佇列的原因来忽略這些預設屬性的執行個體。If you specify the property for a , the identically named properties in a instance sent to that queue cause these default properties to be ignored. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範設定格式化的訊息內文使用。The following code example demonstrates formatting a message body using . [!code-cpp[MessagingBinaryFormatter#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagingBinaryFormatter/CPP/message_binaryformatter.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessagingBinaryFormatter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagingBinaryFormatter/CS/message_binaryformatter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessagingBinaryFormatter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessagingBinaryFormatter/VB/message_binaryformatter.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範設定格式化的訊息內文使用。The following code example demonstrates formatting a message body using . remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要建立的新執行個體使用此多載具有空白主體的類別。Use this overload to create a new instance of the class that has an empty body. 指定屬性或屬性，才能傳送物件。Specify either the property or the property before sending the object. 屬性可以是任何可序列化，例如文字字串、 結構物件、 類別執行個體或內嵌的物件的物件。The property can be any object that can be serialized, such as a text string, a structure object, a class instance, or an embedded object. 除非您撰寫的訊息內容直接屬性，設定再傳送訊息的屬性。Unless you write the contents of the message directly to the property, set the property before you send the message. 使用序列化內文屬性的值，當時上呼叫方法執行個體。The body is serialized using the property's value at the time the method is called on the instance. 鬆散偶合的因此不需要有相同的物件時使用此格式輸入上的寄件者和接收者。The is loosely coupled, so it is not necessary to have the same object type on the sender and receiver when using this format. 和將資料序列化成二進位表示法。The and serialize the data into binary representation. 傳送或接收的 COM 元件時使用。The is used when sending or receiving COM components. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|Initial valueInitial value| |--------------|-------------------| ||`AcknowledgeType.None`| ||`null`| ||00| ||`true`| ||Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider 1.0 版Microsoft Base Cryptographic Provider version 1.0| ||`CryptoProviderType.RSA_FULL`| ||`null`| ||`Stream.null`| ||00| ||`Guid.Empty`| ||空字串 ("")An empty string ("")| ||是長度為零的位元組的陣列A zero-length array of bytes| ||是長度為零的位元組的陣列A zero-length array of bytes| ||`EncryptionAlgorithm.RC2`| ||是長度為零的位元組的陣列A zero-length array of bytes| ||`XmlMessageFormatter`| ||`HashAlgorithm.MD5`| ||空字串 ("")An empty string ("")| ||`MessagePriority.Normal`| ||`false`| ||`null`| ||是長度為零的位元組的陣列A zero-length array of bytes| ||`Message.InfiniteTimeout`| ||`Message.InfiniteTimeout`| ||`null`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將兩個不同優先權的訊息傳送至佇列，接著擷取它們。The following code example sends two messages of different priorities to the queue, and retrieves them subsequently. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定傳送應用程式所要求的通知訊息的類型。The property specifies the type of acknowledgment messages requested by the sending application. 設定之前傳送要求的特定出現次數的通知訊息的屬性 — 比方說，到達其目的地佇列的訊息、 訊息擷取或防止訊息到達，或從擷取的逾時目的地佇列。Set the property before sending the message to request notification of certain occurrences—for example, a message reaching its destination queue, a message being retrieved, or a time-out preventing a message from reaching or being retrieved from the destination queue. 訊息佇列將通知傳回傳送通知訊息至原始訊息所指定的屬性。Message Queuing returns notification by sending acknowledgment messages to the property specified by the original message. 通知訊息的屬性會指出通知它所代表的型別。An acknowledgment message's property indicates the type of acknowledgment that it represents. 例如，如果已傳送通知訊息，因為郵件無法送達目的地之前間隔到期時，的通知訊息的屬性會包含值`ReachQueueTimeout`。For example, if an acknowledgment message was sent because a message did not reach the destination before the interval expired, the property of the acknowledgment message would contain the value `ReachQueueTimeout`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會傳送，並收到包含訂單與佇列的訊息。The following code example sends and receives a message containing an order to and from a queue. 它特別要求正面確認通知，當原始訊息抵達或已從佇列擷取。It specifically requests a positive acknowledgment when the original message reaches or is retrieved from the queue. [!code-cpp[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/CPP/message_acknowledgment.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/CS/message_acknowledgment.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/VB/message_acknowledgment.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您收到來自管理佇列的訊息時，閱讀屬性，確認原始訊息的狀態。When you receive a message from an administration queue, read the property to verify the status of the original message. 當訊息傳送至其目的地佇列時，訊息佇列可以要求張貼通知訊息。When a message is sent to its destination queue, Message Queuing can be requested to post an acknowledgment message. 比方說，這類訊息可能表示訊息到達，並且擷取在指定的逾時，還是有可能表示問題出在哪裡發生傳遞失敗。Such a message can indicate, for example, whether the message arrived and was retrieved within specified time-outs, or it can indicate what went wrong in the case of delivery failure. 目的地佇列傳回通知訊息，並將它們公佈到原始訊息中指定的管理佇列屬性。The destination queue returns acknowledgment messages and posts them to the administration queue specified in the original message's property. 的通知訊息的屬性會識別的通知訊息，而不是在原始的訊息。The property of an acknowledgment message identifies the acknowledgment message, not the original message. 您可以在通知中找到的原始訊息識別碼執行個體的屬性。You can find the identifier of the original message in the acknowledgment instance's property. 如果這個執行個體表示通知訊息，屬性會指定類型的通知。If this instance represents an acknowledgment message, the property specifies the type of acknowledgment. 否則，請屬性包含值`Normal`。Otherwise, the property contains the value `Normal`. 使用屬性的原始訊息至指定的情況下會傳回通知。Use the property of the original message to specify the circumstances under which acknowledgments will be returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含應用程式特有的資訊可供您組織不同類型的訊息。The property contains application-specific information that you can use to organize different types of messages. 例如，您可以使用應用程式特有的索引。For example, you can use application-specific indexes. 要解譯的應用程式負責屬性資訊。It is the responsibility of the application to interpret property information. 可能的話，您應該納入訊息資料訊息的本文而不是屬性。Whenever possible, you should include message data in the body of the message rather than the property. 當使用外部佇列，使用屬性來指定在訊息佇列的訊息屬性不存在。When working with foreign queues, use the property to specify message properties that do not exist in Message Queuing. 如同屬性，它是要了解的內容的應用程式責任屬性。As with the property, it is the responsibility of the application to understand the content of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是位元組陣列，表示傳送的使用者識別碼。The property is an array of bytes that represents the identifier of the sending user. 寄件者識別碼由訊息佇列設定，並依接收的佇列管理員可用來驗證寄件者是否有佇列的存取權限。The sender ID is set by Message Queuing and is used by the receiving Queue Manager to verify whether the sender has access rights to a queue. 沒有寄件者識別碼會指出傳送應用程式，訊息佇列應該不驗證訊息的寄件者，也驗證寄件者的存取權限到接收佇列中。The absence of the sender ID is an indication by the sending application that Message Queuing should not validate the message's sender nor verify the sender's access rights to the receiving queue. 是值得信任，只有當訊息已驗證，當它到達目的地佇列。The is trustworthy only if the message was authenticated when it reached the destination queue. 如果佇列接受已驗證的訊息並到達目的地佇列時，會拒絕訊息或屬性是`false`。The message is rejected when it reaches the destination queue if the queue accepts only authenticated messages and either the or the property is `false`. > [!CAUTION] > 如果拒絕訊息時，它會傳送至無法投遞的信件佇列 (如果是`true`)，或忽略它。If a message is rejected, it is either sent to the dead-letter queue (if is `true`), or it is ignored. 當訊息無法抵達佇列時，您可以要求通知。You can request acknowledgments when a message fails to reach a queue. 否則，當是`false`訊息可能會遺失，而不發出警告。Otherwise, when is `false` the message might be lost without warning. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例取得並設定訊息的值屬性。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message's property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性僅供應用程式在互動訊息正在嘗試判斷是否已要求驗證。The property is used only by the application while it is interacting with the message and trying to determine if authentication was requested. 如果訊息在佇列中，訊息已驗證。If the message is in the queue, the message was authenticated. 相反地，如果屬性是`true`，接收佇列管理員會驗證訊息，當它收到該訊息。Conversely, if the property is `true`, the receiving Queue Manager authenticated the message when it received that message. 您無法判斷是否訊息無法通過驗證藉由查看其屬性。You cannot determine if a message failed authentication by looking at its properties. 訊息佇列會捨棄驗證失敗之前傳送至佇列的訊息。Message Queuing discards messages that fail authentication before they are delivered to the queue. 不過，您可以要求，如果傳遞失敗可防止訊息到達佇列中之傳送通知訊息。However, you can request that an acknowledgment message be sent if a delivery failure prevents the message from arriving in the queue. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示訊息的值屬性。The following code example displays the value of a message's property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 訊息的屬性通常會包含與訊息相關聯的資料。The message's property usually contains the data associated with the message. 雖然您也可以傳送應用程式專屬資料並屬性，您應該包含在訊息資料盡可能的訊息。Although you can also send application-specific data in the and properties, you should include message data in the of the message whenever possible. 只有要序列化或加密屬性內容。Only the property contents are serialized or encrypted. 屬性可包含任何物件，其大小不超過 4 MB。The property can contain any object whose size does not exceed 4 MB. 如果您使用的類型不是任何物件傳送要，該物件將會位於屬性所傳回的執行個體或。If you use to send any object that is not of type to the , that object will be located in the property of the instance returned by or . 中的字串引數`MessageQueue.Send("hello.")`舉例說明這類泛型的物件。The string argument in `MessageQueue.Send("hello.")` is an example of such a generic object. 屬性會指出所儲存訊息主體中的資訊類型。The property indicates the type of information that is stored in the message body. 訊息佇列會使用這項資訊來識別的型別屬性內容。Message Queuing uses this information to identify the type of the property contents. 指定屬性或屬性，才能傳送物件。Specify either the property or the property before sending the object. 屬性可以是任何可序列化的物件，例如文字字串的物件、 結構物件、 類別執行個體或內嵌的物件。The property can be any serializable object, such as a text string, structure object, class instance, or embedded object. 除非您撰寫的訊息內容直接屬性，設定再傳送訊息的屬性。Unless you write the contents of the message directly to the property, set the property before you send the message. 當上呼叫方法使用中所包含的格式器序列化執行個體，主體屬性。When the method is called on the instance, the body is serialized using the formatter contained in the property. 如果您沒有指定值，以傳送訊息屬性，格式器預設為。If you send the message without specifying a value for the property, the formatter defaults to . > [!NOTE] > 嘗試設定的訊息本文會導致當`Send`方法類別稱為和用。Attempting to set the body of a message to will cause a when the `Send` method of the class is called and the is used. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將兩個不同優先權的訊息傳送至佇列，接著擷取它們。The following code example sends two messages of different priorities to the queue, and retrieves them subsequently. remarks.format: ## Remarks 訊息的本文可以包含任何類型的資訊，例如字串、 日期、 貨幣、 數字、 位元組陣列或任何 managed 的物件。The body of a message can consist of any type of information—for example, a string, a date, a currency, a number, an array of bytes, or any managed object. 這項資訊會序列化為来傳遞至佇列。This information is serialized into a to be passed to the queue. 指定屬性或屬性，才能傳送物件。Specify either the property or the property before sending the object. 如果您設定屬性，內容會序列化為屬性。If you set the property, the contents are serialized into the property. 不過，您可以選擇撰寫直接屬性。However, you can choose to write the property directly. 這非常有用，例如，當您想要開啟檔案的連接，並傳送它的內容資料流做為訊息的主體。This is useful, for example, when you want to open a connection to a file and stream its contents as the body of your message. 除非您撰寫的訊息內容直接屬性，設定再傳送訊息的屬性。Unless you write the contents of the message directly to the property, set the property before you send the message. 當上呼叫方法使用中所包含的格式器序列化執行個體，主體屬性。When the method is called on the instance, the body is serialized using the formatter contained in the property. 如果您沒有指定值，以傳送訊息屬性，格式器預設為。If you send the message without specifying a value for the property, the formatter defaults to . 如果您設定屬性，以`true`針對此訊息本文中，將會加密訊息時，只有在您設定時，不屬性。If you set the property to `true` for the body of this message, the message will be encrypted when it is sent, not when you set the property. 因此，屬性永遠不會加密。Therefore, the property is never encrypted.

value.span: 產生回應訊息時，由訊息佇列，當它產生認可或報告訊息，以及應用程式會使用相互關聯識別碼。

span.span: The correlation identifier is used by Message Queuing when it generates an acknowledgment or report message, and by an application when it generates a response message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當訊息佇列產生認可或報告訊息時，它會使用相互關聯識別項屬性，來指定原始訊息的訊息識別項。When Message Queuing generates an acknowledgment or report message, it uses the correlation identifier property to specify the message identifier of the original message. 因此，相互關係識別項會將報告或認可訊息連結到原始訊息。In this manner, the correlation identifier ties the report or acknowledgment message to the original message. 傳送應用程式可以接著使用比對通知或報表與原始訊息屬性來識別原始訊息的屬性。The sending application can then match the acknowledgment or report with the original message by using the property to identify the original message's property. 連接器應用程式也必須設定的認可和報告的訊息為原始訊息的訊息識別項的屬性。Connector applications also must set the property of the acknowledgment and report messages to the message identifier of the original message. 當您的應用程式會將回應訊息傳送至傳送應用程式時，您可以設定原始訊息的訊息識別項的回應訊息的屬性。When your application sends a response message to the sending application, you can set the property of the response message to the message identifier of the original message. 傳送應用程式可以接著比對您的回應訊息已傳送的訊息。The sending application can then match your response message to the message that was sent. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會傳送，並收到包含訂單與佇列的訊息。The following code example sends and receives a message that contains an order to and from a queue. 它特別要求正面確認通知，當原始訊息抵達或已從佇列擷取。It specifically requests a positive acknowledgment when the original message reaches or is retrieved from the queue. remarks.format: ## Remarks 兩個案例要求您使用屬性。Two scenarios require you to use the property. 第一個時，您的應用程式，而非訊息佇列時，會加密訊息。The first is when your application, rather than Message Queuing, encrypts a message. 第二個是當您將加密的訊息傳送至以外的訊息佇列的佇列系統。The second is when you send an encrypted message to a queuing system other than Message Queuing. 您設定此屬性之前，您必須加密接收佇列管理員的公用金鑰的對稱金鑰。Before you set this property, you must encrypt the symmetric key with the public key of the receiving queue manager. 當您傳送應用程式加密訊息時，接收佇列管理員會使用對稱金鑰來解密訊息，再將它傳送到其目的地佇列。When you send an application-encrypted message, the receiving queue manager uses the symmetric key to decrypt the message before sending it to its destination queue. 如果您將訊息傳送至外部佇列時，訊息是第一次收到適當的連接器應用程式，將加密的訊息轉送至接收應用程式附加的對稱金鑰。If you send a message to a foreign queue, the message is first received by the appropriate connector application, which forwards the encrypted message with the attached symmetric key to the receiving application. 就接收的應用程式，來解密訊息使用的對稱金鑰的責任。It is then the responsibility of the receiving application to decrypt the message using the symmetric key. 當您設定屬性，您也必須設定屬性。When you set the property, you must also set the property. 當傳送訊息時，訊息佇列會忽略屬性如果也未設定屬性。When the message is sent, Message Queuing ignores the property if the property is not also set. 屬性的最大陣列大小為 256。The property has a maximum array size of 256.

summary.span: Gets or sets the digital signature that Message Queuing uses to authenticate the message.

span.span: Gets or sets the digital signature that Message Queuing uses to authenticate the message.

value.span: 指定用來驗證訊息的 Message Queuing 1.0 數位簽章的位元組值陣列。

span.span: An array of byte values that specifies the Message Queuing 1.0 digital signature used to authenticate the message.

value.span: 預設值是長度為零的陣列。

span.span: The default is a zero-length array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在驗證訊息傳送的訊息佇列的 1.0 版時，訊息佇列會使用數位簽章。Message Queuing uses the digital signature when authenticating messages that were sent by Message Queuing version 1.0. 在大部分情況下，訊息佇列會產生並設定傳送應用程式要求驗證時的屬性。In most cases, Message Queuing generates and sets the property when the sending application requests authentication. 接收應用程式會使用這個屬性來擷取附加至訊息的數位簽章。The receiving application uses this property to retrieve the digital signature attached to the message. 您只能使用執行 Message Queuing 2.0 版時的屬性。You can only use the property when running Message Queuing version 2.0. 要求驗證時，傳送應用程式必須指定 Message Queuing 1.0 版簽章。The sending application must specify Message Queuing version 1.0 signatures when requesting authentication. 如果傳送應用程式傳送的訊息佇列版本 2.0 簽章，此屬性會包含四個位元組，每個包含零的緩衝區。If the sending application sends a Message Queuing version 2.0 signature, this property contains a buffer of four bytes, each containing zero. 屬性，連同屬性，也會使用連接器應用程式傳送訊息時。The property, together with the property, is also used by connector applications when a message is sent. 在此案例中，連接器應用程式，而不是訊息佇列，會產生數位簽章，則根據在傳送訊息之使用者的憑證。In this scenario, the connector application—rather than Message Queuing—generates the digital signature, which it bases on the certificate of the user sending the message. 屬性的最大陣列大小為 256。The property has a maximum array size of 256. 當您設定屬性，您也必須設定屬性。When you set the property, you must also set the property. 當傳送訊息時，訊息佇列會忽略屬性如果也未設定屬性。When a message is sent, Message Queuing ignores the property if the property is not also set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果訊息是私用 （加密），它會加密之前傳送和接收時加以解密。If a message is private (encrypted), it is encrypted before it is sent and decrypted upon receipt. 屬性會指定用來加密私用訊息的訊息本文的演算法。The property specifies the algorithm used to encrypt the message body of a private message. 佇列可以要求傳入訊息必須加密。A queue can require that incoming messages be encrypted. 如果應用程式傳送未加密的 （非私用） 訊息到佇列只接受私用訊息，或者如果它傳送至佇列的私用訊息，只接受非私用訊息，佇列會拒絕訊息。If an application sends a non-encrypted (non-private) message to a queue that accepts only private messages, or if it sends a private message to a queue that accepts only non-private messages, the queue rejects the message. 傳送應用程式可以要求此情況下，傳回負值通知訊息。The sending application can request that a negative acknowledgment message be returned in such a case.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性讀取和寫入訊息時。Use the property when reading and writing a message. 當訊息傳送至佇列時，格式器序列化成可以傳送至訊息佇列的資料流的屬性。When a message is sent to the queue, the formatter serializes the property into a stream that can be sent to the message queue. 從佇列讀取時，格式器還原序列化成訊息資料屬性。When reading from a queue, the formatter deserializes the message data into the property. 除非您撰寫的訊息內容直接屬性，設定再傳送訊息的屬性。Unless you write the contents of the message directly to the property, set the property before you send the message. 當上呼叫方法使用中所包含的格式器序列化執行個體，主體屬性。When the method is called on the instance, the body is serialized using the formatter contained in the property. 如果您沒有指定值，以傳送訊息屬性，格式器預設為。If you send the message without specifying a value for the property, the formatter defaults to . 鬆散偶合的因此不需要有相同的物件時使用此格式輸入上的寄件者和接收者。The is loosely coupled, so it is not necessary to have the same object type on the sender and receiver when using this format. 和將資料序列化成二進位表示法。The and serialize the data into binary representation. 傳送或接收的 COM 元件時使用。The is used when sending or receiving COM components. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範設定格式化的訊息內文使用。The following code example demonstrates formatting a message body using . value.span: 訊息的唯一識別碼，由訊息佇列產生。

span.span: The message's unique identifier, which is generated by Message Queuing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 訊息佇列在傳送訊息時，會產生的訊息識別項。Message Queuing generates a message identifier when the message is sent. 識別項是 20 個位元組所組成，並且包含兩個項目： 機器傳送端電腦的電腦上訊息的唯一識別碼。The identifier is composed of 20 bytes and includes two items: the machine of the sending computer and a unique identifier for the message on the computer. 這兩個項目合併起來產生網路上唯一的訊息識別項。The combination of the two items produces a message identifier that is unique on the network. 訊息佇列產生的所有訊息的訊息識別項，包括認可和報告的訊息。Message Queuing generates message identifiers for all messages—including acknowledgment and report messages. 由訊息佇列的抵達或失敗的原始、 傳送的訊息通常傳送通知訊息。An acknowledgment message is generally sent by Message Queuing in reaction to the arrival or failure of an original, sent message. 您可以找到中的原始訊息的屬性值的通知訊息的屬性。You can find the property value of the original message in the property of an acknowledgment message. 您也可以使用時將回應訊息傳送至回應佇列的屬性。You can also use the property when sending a response message to a response queue. 若要在回應訊息中包含原始訊息的識別碼，設定回應訊息的屬性原始訊息的屬性。To include the identifier of the original message in a response message, set the property of the response message to the property of the original message. 讀取回應訊息的應用程式然後可以使用的回應訊息的相互關聯識別碼來識別原始訊息。The application reading the response message can then use the correlation identifier of the response message to identify the original message. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會傳送，並收到包含訂單與佇列的訊息。The following code example sends and receives a message containing an order to and from a queue. 它特別要求正面確認通知，當原始訊息抵達或已從佇列擷取。It specifically requests a positive acknowledgment when the original message reaches or is retrieved from the queue. [!code-cpp[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/CPP/message_acknowledgment.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/CS/message_acknowledgment.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Message.Acknowledgment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.Acknowledgment/VB/message_acknowledgment.vb#1)]

For the former, the time-out is the maximum time allowed for a message to be received from the queue. 對於後者，逾時是允許的訊息到達佇列的時間。For the latter, the time-out is the time allowed for a message to reach the queue. 在這兩種情況下，您可以指定逾時秒數，或使用表示沒有逾時。In both cases, you can specify the time-out as a number of seconds or use to indicate that no time-out exists. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用欄位。The following code example demonstrates the use of the field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接收應用程式使用屬性，確認訊息已傳送到單一佇列的單一交易中的第一個訊息。Receiving applications use the property to verify that a message was the first message sent in a single transaction to a single queue. 這個屬性就只能使用 Message Queuing 2.0 版及更新版本。This property is available only with Message Queuing version 2.0 and later. 若要驗證交易的界限，您可以使用屬性，以及兩個其他屬性：和。To verify transaction boundaries, you can use the property along with two other properties: and . 若要檢查訊息是否是在交易中，傳送的最後一個訊息，請使用前者，使用後者來擷取交易的識別碼。Use the former to check whether a message was the last message sent in the transaction, and use the latter to retrieve the identifier of the transaction. 如果只有在交易中，傳送一則訊息並屬性都設為`true`。If only one message is sent in a transaction, the and properties are both set to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示訊息的值屬性。The following code example displays the value of a message's property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 訊息標籤可以用於多種用途。You can use a message label for several purposes. 例如，您可以將它用於顯示，或者根據標籤值對訊息進行選擇性的處理。For example, you can use it for display purposes or to selectively process messages based on the label value. 標籤不需要是唯一的訊息。The label does not need to be unique across messages. 訊息佇列和訊息標籤表示應用程式定義的值，這個值會以人們可讀取 (Human-Readable) 的詞彙協助識別佇列或訊息。Message queue and message labels represent an application-defined value that can help identify the queue or message in human-readable terms. 它負責解譯標籤內容，其中沒有任何內建的意義，訊息佇列應用程式的應用程式。It is the responsibility of the application to interpret the label contents, which have no intrinsic meaning to the Message Queuing application. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例取得並設定訊息的值屬性。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message's property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LookupId As Long
public: property long LookupId { long get(); };

summary.span: Introduced in MSMQ 3.0.

span.span: Introduced in MSMQ 3.0.

summary.span: Gets the message's lookup identifier.

span.span: Gets the message's lookup identifier.

value.span: 訊息的查閱識別碼，由訊息佇列產生，而且是專用的佇列訊息的所在位置。

span.span: The message's lookup identifier, which is generated by Message Queuing and is unique to the queue where the message resides.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性提供唯讀存取的訊息查詢識別項。The property provides read-only access to a message's lookup identifier. 在 MSMQ 3.0 中引進的查詢識別是 64 位元識別碼，由訊息佇列 」 產生並指派給每個訊息，訊息會放在佇列中時。The lookup identifier, introduced in MSMQ 3.0, is a 64-bit identifier that is generated by Message Queuing and assigned to each message when the message is placed in the queue. 查閱識別碼不是在傳送訊息時產生的訊息識別項相同。The lookup identifier is not the same as the message identifier that is generated when the message is sent. 訊息佇列會產生所有位於任何佇列，包括應用程式所產生的目的地、 管理和報告佇列，以及系統產生的日誌、 信件、 連接器和傳出佇列的訊息查詢識別項。Message Queuing generates a lookup identifier for all messages that are placed in any queue, including application-generated destination, administration, and report queues, as well as system-generated journal, dead-letter, connector, and outgoing queues. 換句話說，這包括這兩個傳送由傳送應用程式和訊息佇列的訊息。In other words, this includes both messages sent by sending applications and by Message Queuing. 查詢識別項是唯一的佇列和佇列之外沒有意義。The lookup identifier is unique to the queue and has no meaning outside the queue. 如果將訊息傳送至數個目的地佇列，或時它會放在其各自的佇列訊息的複本儲存在電腦日誌或佇列日誌中，如果訊息的每個複本會有它自己的查詢識別項。If a message is sent to several destination queues, or if a copy of a message is stored in a computer journal or queue journal, each copy of the message will have its own lookup identifier when it is placed in its respective queue. 屬性只能讀取從佇列擷取的訊息。The property can only be read on messages retrieved from a queue. 查閱識別碼用來讀取佇列中的特定訊息。A lookup identifier is used to read a specific message in the queue. 一旦已知的訊息查詢識別項，接收應用程式可以呼叫或直接移至該訊息並查看或擷取的佇列，不同於必須從佇列前端開始的資料指標的函式和瀏覽佇列的結尾Once the lookup identifier of a message is known, the receiving application can call the or function to go directly to that message and peek at or retrieve it from the queue, unlike cursors that must start at the front of the queue and navigate towards the end of the queue, 取得佇列中訊息的查詢識別項是應用程式的責任。Obtaining the lookup identifiers of the messages in the queue is the responsibility of the application. 若要取得的查詢識別項的一種可能方式是建立會叫用快取的每個訊息識別項，因為它們都放在佇列中元件的目的端佇列的觸發程序。One possible way to obtain the lookup identifiers is to create a trigger for the destination queue that invokes a component that caches the identifiers of each message as they are placed in the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 訊息佇列在傳送訊息時，通常會設定這個屬性。Message Queuing typically sets this property when it sends the message. 訊息佇列的訊息可以是下列其中一個類型：A Message Queuing message can be one of the following types: - `Normal`其中的一般訊息從傳送至佇列，應用程式，或回應訊息傳回給傳送應用程式。`Normal`, which is either a typical message sent from an application to a queue, or a response message returned to the sending application. - `Acknowledgement`由訊息佇列產生每當傳送應用程式要求。`Acknowledgement`, which Message Queuing generates whenever the sending application requests one. 例如，訊息佇列可以產生正或負訊息，以表示原始訊息已抵達或已被讀取。For example, Message Queuing can generate positive or negative messages to indicate that the original message arrived or was read. 訊息佇列會將適當的認可訊息傳回給傳送應用程式所指定的管理佇列。Message Queuing returns the appropriate acknowledgment message to the administration queue specified by the sending application. - `Report`由訊息佇列產生每當報告佇列在來源佇列管理員定義。`Report`, which Message Queuing generates whenever a report queue is defined at the source Queue Manager. 追蹤功能啟用時，只要原始訊息進入或離開訊息佇列伺服器，訊息佇列就會傳送報告訊息至訊息佇列報告佇列。When tracing is enabled, Message Queuing sends a report message to the Message Queuing report queue each time the original message enters or leaves a Message Queuing server. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示訊息的值屬性。The following code example displays the value of a message's property.

summary.span: Gets or sets the message priority, which determines where in the queue the message is placed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會影響訊息佇列處理的方式在訊息移動時，以及當它到達其目的地。The property affects how Message Queuing handles the message both while it is en route and once it reaches its destination. 較高優先權的訊息在路由期間會給予喜好設定，並且插入目的端佇列的前端。Higher-priority messages are given preference during routing and inserted toward the front of the destination queue. 優先權相同的訊息會根據抵達時間放置在佇列中。Messages with the same priority are placed in the queue according to their arrival time. 您可以設定有意義的優先順序只針對非交易式訊息。You can set a meaningful priority only for non-transactional messages. 訊息佇列會自動設定交易式訊息的優先權`Lowest`，因而導致交易式訊息的優先權會被忽略。Message Queuing automatically sets the priority for transactional messages to `Lowest`, which causes transactional message priority to be ignored. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將兩個不同優先權的訊息傳送至佇列，接著擷取它們。The following code example sends two messages of different priorities to the queue, and retrieves them subsequently. [!code-cpp[Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend/CPP/message_defaultandpriority.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend/CS/message_defaultandpriority.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Message.DefaultPropertiesToSend/VB/message_defaultandpriority.vb#1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the message is guaranteed to be delivered in the event of a computer failure or network problem.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the message is guaranteed to be delivered in the event of a computer failure or network problem.

value.span: 如果訊息的傳遞保證 （透過將訊息儲存在磁碟路由途中）;如果不保證傳送則。

span.span: if delivery of the message is guaranteed (through saving the message to disk while en route); if delivery is not assured.

value.span: 預設值為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出是否保證訊息傳遞 — 即使電腦損毀時的訊息目的端佇列途中。The property indicates whether the delivery of a message is guaranteed—even if a computer crashes while the message is en route to the destination queue. 如果郵件的傳遞保證，訊息會儲存在本機的路由中的每一個步驟，直到訊息成功轉送至下一步 的電腦。If delivery of a message is guaranteed, the message is stored locally at every step along the route, until the message is successfully forwarded to the next computer. 設定屬性設`true`可能會影響輸送量。Setting the property to `true` could affect throughput. 如果交易式訊息，訊息佇列會自動將訊息視為可復原，不論值屬性。If the message is transactional, Message Queuing automatically treats the message as recoverable, regardless of the value of the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例取得並設定訊息的值屬性。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message's property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接收應用程式會使用屬性時的訊息包含外部的安全性憑證。The receiving application uses the property when the message includes an external security certificate. 訊息佇列可以驗證訊息使用的內部或外部的安全性憑證。Message Queuing can authenticate a message using either an internal or external security certificate. 訊息佇列會提供內部憑證，用來驗證訊息的完整性。Message Queuing provides internal certificates, which are used to verify message integrity. 憑證授權單位提供的外部憑證，您可以透過存取訊息屬性。A certification authority provides an external certificate, which you can access through the property of the message. 除了讓訊息佇列來驗證訊息、 的外部憑證可讓接收應用程式進一步驗證寄件者。In addition to allowing Message Queuing to authenticate the message, an external certificate allows the receiving application to further verify the sender. 內部憑證沒有任何可用的值，以接收應用程式。An internal certificate has no usable value to a receiving application. 必須以目錄服務的訊息佇列系統註冊的外部憑證。An external certificate must be registered with the directory service of the Message Queuing system. 外部憑證包含憑證授權單位、 憑證的使用者、 憑證的有效期間、 公開金鑰憑證的使用者和憑證授權單位的簽章的相關資訊。An external certificate contains information about the certification authority, the certificate user, the validity period of the certificate, the public key of the certificate user, and the certification authority's signature.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性是`false`，在指定的寄件者識別碼時傳送未屬性附加至訊息。If the property is `false`, the sender identifier specified in the property is not attached to the message when it is sent. 這表示訊息佇列傳送訊息到目的端佇列時，不應該驗證寄件者。This indicates to Message Queuing that the sender should not be validated when it sends the message to the destination queue. 如果屬性是`true`，則屬性值是訊息已驗證時，才值得信任。If the property is `true`, the property value is trustworthy only if the message was authenticated. 使用屬性搭配屬性，確認 寄件者的存取權限。Use the property in conjunction with the property to verify the sender's access rights. 連接器應用程式是使用連接器伺服器來提供訊息佇列與其他佇列的系統之間通訊的應用程式。A connector application is an application that uses a connector server to provide communication between Message Queuing and other queuing systems. 訊息佇列需要連接器應用程式提供寄件者識別碼。Message Queuing requires connector applications to provide sender identification. 您必須設定時透過連接器應用程式傳送訊息的屬性。You must set the property when sending a message through a connector application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定從目的端佇列接收已傳送的訊息的總時間。The property specifies the total time for a sent message to be received from the destination queue. 時間限制包含連到目的端佇列和所花費的時間，才能接收訊息佇列中等候所花費的時間。The time limit includes the time spent getting to the destination queue and the time spent waiting in the queue before the message is received. > [!CAUTION] > 當使用依存性用戶端電腦，請務必執行訊息佇列伺服器的時鐘同步處理用戶端電腦上的時鐘。When using dependent client computers, be sure the clock on the client computer is synchronized with the clock on the server that is running Message Queuing. 傳送訊息時，無法預期的行為，否則可能會造成其屬性不是。Otherwise, unpredictable behavior might result when sending a message whose property is not . 如果指定的間隔屬性到期之前從佇列移除訊息，訊息佇列捨棄的訊息中有兩種。If the interval specified by the property expires before the message is removed from the queue, Message Queuing discards the message in one of two ways. 如果訊息的 屬性是 `true`，訊息就會傳送到寄不出的信件佇列。If the message's property is `true`, the message is sent to the dead-letter queue. 如果是`false`，會忽略該訊息。If is `false`, the message is ignored. 您可以設定訊息的屬性來要求的訊息佇列傳送負值通知訊息回到傳送應用程式如果在計時器終止前，不會擷取訊息。You can set the message's property to request that Message Queuing send a negative acknowledgment message back to the sending application if the message is not retrieved before the timer expires. 如果所指定的值屬性是所指定的值小於屬性，會優先使用。If the value specified by the property is less than the value specified by the property, takes precedence. 當在單一交易中傳送數個訊息時，訊息佇列會使用第一個訊息的屬性。When several messages are sent in a single transaction, Message Queuing uses the property of the first message. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例取得並設定訊息的值屬性。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message's property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的間隔屬性到期的訊息抵達其目的地之前，訊息佇列捨棄的訊息中有兩種。If the interval specified by the property expires before the message reaches its destination, Message Queuing discards the message in one of two ways. 如果訊息的 屬性是 `true`，訊息就會傳送到寄不出的信件佇列。If the message's property is `true`, the message is sent to the dead-letter queue. 如果是`false`，會忽略該訊息If is `false`, the message is ignored 您可以設定他的訊息屬性來要求的訊息佇列傳送負值通知訊息回到傳送應用程式如果在計時器終止前未到達的訊息。You can set he message's property to request that Message Queuing send a negative acknowledgment message back to the sending application if the message does not arrive before the timer expires. 如果屬性設定為 0 秒時，訊息佇列一次嘗試將訊息傳送至其目的地，如果佇列正等待訊息。If the property is set to 0 seconds, Message Queuing tries once to send the message to its destination—if the queue is waiting for the message. 如果本機佇列，訊息永遠會到達。If the queue is local, the message always reaches it. 如果所指定的值屬性所指定的值大於屬性，會優先使用。If the value specified by the property is greater than the value specified by the property, takes precedence. 當在單一交易中傳送數個訊息時，訊息佇列會使用第一個訊息的屬性。When several messages are sent in a single transaction, Message Queuing uses the property of the first message. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例取得並設定訊息的值屬性。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message's property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接收應用程式使用屬性，確認已為特定交易的一部分傳送一則訊息。Receiving applications use the property to verify that a message was sent as part of a specific transaction. 交易識別碼包含在傳送端電腦 （第一個 16 位元），後面接著一個 4 位元組交易序號的識別碼。The transaction identifier contains the identifier of the sending computer (first 16 bits) followed by a 4-byte transaction sequence number. 這個屬性是僅適用於訊息佇列版本 2.0 和更新版本。This property is available only for Message Queuing version 2.0 and later. 交易識別項不保證是唯一的因為交易序號不具持續性，然後他們重新 2 20。Transaction identifiers are not guaranteed to be unique, because transaction sequence numbers are not persistent, and they start over again at 2 20. 訊息佇列只能保證，後續的交易都會都有不同的交易序號。Message Queuing guarantees only that subsequent transactions will have different transaction sequence numbers. 您可以使用屬性連同和屬性，以確認交易界限。You can use the property along with the and properties to verify transaction boundaries. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示訊息的值屬性。The following code example displays the value of a message's property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會識別讀取回條通知接收連接器應用程式的來源電腦上的交易式佇列。The property identifies the transactional queue on the source computer that receives read-receipt acknowledgments from connector applications. 訊息佇列設定屬性，並擷取交易式傳送至外部佇列的訊息時，連接器應用程式會使用屬性。Message Queuing sets the property, and connector applications use the property when retrieving transactional messages sent to foreign queues. 在非 Microsoft Message Queuing 的佇列系統中存在的外部索引的佇列。A foreign queue exists in a queuing system other than Microsoft Message Queuing. 訊息佇列通訊使用透過連接器應用程式這類佇列。Message Queuing communicates with such queues through a connector application. 連接器應用程式可以使用的異動狀態佇列來傳送通知訊息傳回給傳送應用程式。The connector application can use the transaction status queue to send acknowledgment messages back to the sending application. 即使傳送的應用程式不會要求其他認可的交易狀態應該會收到這些通知。The transaction status queue should receive these acknowledgments even if the sending application does not request other acknowledgments. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示訊息的值屬性。The following code example displays the value of a message's property.

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the message was (or must be) authenticated before being sent.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the message was (or must be) authenticated before being sent.

span.span: if the sending application requested authentication for the message; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定訊息是否需要進行驗證。The property specifies whether the message needs to be authenticated. 如果傳送應用程式要求驗證時，訊息佇列會建立數位簽章，並使用它來簽署訊息，傳送和接收時，驗證訊息。If the sending application requests authentication, Message Queuing creates a digital signature and uses it to sign the message when it is sent and authenticate the message when it is received. 如果是`false`和訊息傳送至佇列只接受已驗證的訊息、 在到達佇列的訊息將會遭到拒絕。If is `false` and a message is sent to a queue that accepts only authenticated messages, the message will be rejected when it reaches the queue. 您無法判斷是否訊息無法通過驗證藉由查看其屬性。You cannot determine if a message failed authentication by looking at its properties. 訊息佇列會捨棄這類訊息之前傳送至佇列。Message Queuing discards such messages before they are delivered to the queue. 不過，您可以要求，如果傳遞失敗可防止訊息到達佇列中之傳送通知訊息。However, you can request that an acknowledgment message be sent if a delivery failure prevents a message from arriving in the queue.

value.span: 如果訊息傳遞錯誤會導致訊息傳送至無法投遞的信件佇列; 的複本，否則， 。

span.span: if message-delivery failure should result in a copy of the message being sent to a dead-letter queue; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和屬性會指定如何追蹤訊息佇列的訊息。The and properties specify how Message Queuing tracks a message. 如果是`true`，傳遞失敗 （的非交易式訊息），會導致訊息傳送至非異動式寄不出信件佇列無法傳遞訊息的電腦上。If is `true`, delivery failure (of a non-transactional message), causes the message to be sent to the non-transactional dead-letter queue on the computer that could not deliver the message. 傳遞失敗，可能是郵件計時器過期，例如所造成的。Delivery failure could be caused by a message timer expiring, for example. 在交易式訊息的傳遞失敗，訊息佇列傳送訊息至交易式寄不出信件佇列在所有負數且不確定的情況下在來源機器上。In the case of delivery failure for a transactional message, Message Queuing sends the message to the transactional dead-letter queue on the source machine in all negative and in-doubt cases. 當您將訊息儲存在寄不出信件佇列中時，您應該清除定期以移除不再需要的訊息佇列。When you store messages in a dead-letter queue, you should clear the queue periodically to remove messages that are no longer needed. 在寄不出信件佇列對佇列所在的電腦的大小配額的計數中儲存的訊息。Messages stored in dead-letter queues count against the size quota for the computer where the queue resides. 電腦配額由系統管理員所設定，而是指配置來儲存訊息的整個電腦上，不只是在單一佇列的大小。The computer quota is set by the administrator and refers to the size allocated for storing messages on the whole computer, not just in a single queue. 您不想建立日誌或寄不出信件佇列。You do not create a journal or dead-letter queue. 這些是訊息佇列產生這兩個系統佇列。These are both system queues that Message Queuing generates. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例取得並設定訊息的值屬性。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message's property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若為私人訊息之前傳送和接收時解密加密其主體。If a message is private, its body is encrypted before it is sent and decrypted when it is received. 若要傳送的私用訊息，傳送應用程式必須指定用於加密和 （選擇性） 的加密演算法。To send a private message, the sending application must specify that encryption be used and, optionally, the encryption algorithm. 傳送私人訊息時，您的應用程式不必執行訊息加密。When sending private messages, your application does not need to perform the message encryption. 訊息佇列可讓您加密訊息本文，如果您的應用程式會傳送 Microsoft Windows 2000 企業中，有權存取目錄服務內的訊息。Message Queuing can encrypt the message body for you if your application is sending messages within a Microsoft Windows 2000 enterprise, which has access to the directory service. 接收私用的訊息時，接收佇列管理員一律會解密訊息內文。When receiving private messages, the receiving Queue Manager always decrypts the message body. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例取得並設定訊息的值屬性。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message's property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和屬性會指定如何追蹤訊息佇列的訊息。The and properties specify how Message Queuing tracks a message. 如果是`true`，則複本會保存每個步驟，訊息會傳輸原始的電腦上電腦日誌中。If is `true`, then a copy is kept in the computer journal on the originating machine at each step that a message is transmitted. 如果目的地佇列是在遠端電腦上，則傳送的訊息只會複製到日誌佇列。The sent message is only copied to the journal queue if the destination queue is on a remote computer. 如果目的地是在本機電腦上，訊息會直接傳送至佇列沒有任何需要的日誌功能的中繼步驟。If the destination is on the local computer, the message is sent directly to the queue; there are no intermediate steps to require journaling. 當您將訊息儲存在日誌佇列中時，清除 定期以移除不再需要的訊息佇列。When you store messages in a journal queue, clear the queue periodically to remove messages that are no longer needed. 計算儲存在日誌佇列的佇列所在的電腦配額的訊息。Messages stored in journal queues count against the quota for the computer where the queue resides. （由系統管理員會設定電腦配額）。(The computer quota is set by the administrator.) 您不想建立日誌或寄不出信件佇列。You do not create a journal or dead-letter queue. 這些是訊息佇列產生這兩個系統佇列。These are both system queues that Message Queuing generates. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例取得並設定訊息的值屬性。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message's property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指定是否要向其目的佇列移動追蹤之訊息的路由。The property specifies whether to track the route of a message as it moves toward its destination queue. 如果`true`，訊息會通過訊息佇列路由伺服器每次傳送 （由訊息佇列產生） 報告訊息至報告佇列。If `true`, a report message (generated by Message Queuing) is sent to a report queue each time the message passes through a Message Queuing routing server. 來源佇列管理員所指定的報告佇列。The report queue is specified by the source Queue Manager. 報告佇列並不限於由訊息佇列; 產生的報告訊息您應用程式所產生的訊息也會傳送到報告佇列。Report queues are not limited to report messages generated by Message Queuing; your application-generated messages can also be sent to report queues. 使用追蹤，牽涉到設定 Active Directory，並指定訊息佇列企業版的報告佇列。Using tracing involves setting up Active Directory and specifying a report queue for the Message Queuing enterprise. 系統管理員會設定這些設定。The administrator configures these settings. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例取得並設定訊息的值屬性。The following code example gets and sets the value of a message's property.
